name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: IDX Pixel - Check install and events

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: IDX is an all-in-one digital advertising platform, connecting premium brands and agencies to their selected audiences.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension is used to troubleshoot IDX's pixel implementation.
The IDX Pixel Tracker is a testing tool that helps validate your pixel implementation.
It checks for existing header pixels, conversion events, and provides real-time information on the implementation.
To see a detailed log of events from pixels that were implemented on the page, click on the IDX pixel tracker icon.
